price: Da zĩnãriya. Kuma dukan wancan abu bai zama ba, sai jin dãɗin rãyuwar dũniya nekawai' alhãli kuwa Lãhira, a wurin Ubangijinka, ta mãsu taƙawa ce.
arabic: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhālika lammā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-ākhiratu ʿinda rabbika lil'muttaqīna
